Just to clarify for everyone who doesn't know what a TS is, a TS has the same video source as a CAM but has audio pulled directly from an audio stream.

Some people have mentioned a TS as being a TC, a TC is ripped directly from the projection of the movie.

A CAM is simply recorded with a video camera, both audio and video.

It doesn't matter what software was used to encode or anything like that it simply describes what sources where used for audio or video.
